publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1037 Chris Ballance: Retention of Recommended Retail Price—That the Parliament supports the campaign by the Writers’ Guild of Great Britain, the Society of Authors, J K Rowling and other writers to maintain the recommended retail price (RRP) on books; recognises the importance of the cultural industries to Scotland and the fact that discounting prices on books means that writers receive less income and therefore will find it harder to survive, and therefore calls on the Scottish Publishers Association to require all its members to retain the RRP.R
S2M-1037 Retention of Recommended Retail Price (lodged on 10 March 2004) Eleanor Scott*, Patrick Harvie*

S2M-1037 Chris Ballance: Retention of Recommended Retail Price-That the Parliament supports the campaign by the Writers' Guild of Great Britain, the Society of Authors, J K Rowling and other writers to maintain the recommended retail price (RRP) on books; recognises the importance of the cultural industries to Scotland and the fact that discounting prices on books means that writers receive less income and therefore will find it harder to survive, and therefore calls on the Scottish Publishers Association to require all its members to retain the RRP. R Supported by: Eleanor Scott, Patrick Harvie, Christine Grahame*
S2M-1037 Retention of Recommended Retail Price (lodged on 10 March 2004) Robin Harper*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1037 Retention of Recommended Retail Price (lodged on 10 March 2004) Shiona Baird*
S2M-1037 Retention of Recommended Retail Price (lodged on 10 March 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*, John Swinburne*
S2M-1037 Retention of Recommended Retail Price (lodged on 10 March 2004) Tommy Sheridan*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-1037 Retention of Recommended Retail Price (lodged on 10 March 2004) Rob Gibson*
S2M-1037 Retention of Recommended Retail Price (lodged on 10 March 2004) Mark Ballard*
